data.title: Mini sudoku solver
data.statement:
You must write a program that solves a {{4×4}} sudoku grid that have only one solution.
A solved sudoku is a latin square for which each {{2×2}} corner square must also contain all the digits {{1}} to {{4}}.
data.constraints: There are six hints or more.
data.stubGenerator:
read line1:word(4)
read line2:word(4)
read line3:word(4)
read line4:word(4)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
You are given a {{4×4}} grid, the empty cells are represented by {{0}}. For example:
2000
0130
3001
0240
data.outputDescription:
The output must be the only solution, all the zeros must be filled by the correct digits.
Here:
2314
4132
3421
1243

lastVersion.statementHTML:
The program:
You must write a program that solves a 4×4 sudoku grid that have only one solution.
A solved sudoku is a latin square for which each 2×2 corner square must also contain all the digits 1 to 4.
INPUT:
You are given a 4×4 grid, the empty cells are represented by 0. For example:
2000
0130
3001
0240

OUTPUT:
The output must be the only solution, all the zeros must be filled by the correct digits.
Here:
2314
4132
3421
1243

CONSTRAINTS:
There are six hints or more.

EXAMPLE:
Input
2043
0020
4300
0034
Output
2143
3421
4312
1234
